settings.name: Radiator name
settings.description: The name of this radiator application.

settings.name: Overview template
settings.description: The template to use for displaying the overview (main view).

settings.name: Maximum columns in default overview
settings.description: The maximum columns of tasks to display in the default overview.

settings.name: Rows on each overview page
settings.description: The amount of rows of tasks that can fit on one page in the default overview.

settings.name: Remote server poll interval
settings.description: The delay, in seconds, between each poll of the remote teamcity server.

settings.name: Url of Teamcity server.
settings.description: Url of Teamcity server. Must have guest account enabled.

settings.name: Number of builds
settings.description: Maximum number of builds to fetch from the TeamCity server
